alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 12:30PM EST until January 07 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. .Recent heavy rains in the Ohio River basin are expected to cause rises in the river with multiple locations rising above flood stage this week. For the Green River...including Paradise...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 384.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 386.1 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
